Allow me to help. Someone thought it`d be funny to steal my torrent file and post it where i had originally. Anyways, this is for anyone having trouble getting the cracks to work. You *CAN`T*
I repeat, *CAN`T* install Nightlife last The crack won't work. You have to install *Sims 2: Seasons* last and use that crack. There is however a slight possibillity that you will have to install Apartment life Last and use it's crack. I installed apartment life after i got seasons and it worked Perfectly. The music will put you to sleep but it will work. Hope I helped! ^-^

Oh and by the way. I have a Keygen that works with all the Sims 2 games as I'd be happy to give anyone who would want a fresh Serial over a used one. I have tested it with all the sims 2 games and its a breeze to use; Step one, Open it! Step two, Search for the Sims 2 game u are installing, Three, Click generate only when the installer asks for a serial. It will automatically copy/paste the generated serial into the installer so you don't have to! Just Email me at EndevoraVII@Hotmail.com and I'll send it to you!
